snippet.title: 🔵Child Victim #2 | Nichiren Ogando Case | Police Interview
snippet.description:
A man is accused of using a hidden camera to secretly record his girlfriend and her children, according to the Coral Springs Police Department.

Interrogation has been redacted

Nichiren Rugeles Ogando, 37, allegedly used a camera disguised as a smoke detector to capture footage of them using the bathroom and taking a shower. One of the children is 7 years old and the other is 16 years old, police said.

Ogando’s girlfriend told investigators she “discovered a smoke detector in her children’s bathroom,” which contained an SD card, according to the report. She told police she did not install the camera or give permission for it to be installed.

When police interrogated Ogando, he said he had never watched the videos. Detective weren’t buying it.

Investigators reportedly found 12 videos of his girlfriend, 32 videos of a 7 year old, and 65 videos of a 16 year old, undressing or using the bathroom on Ogando’s devices, the report states.

Ogando was arrested and is facing three counts of voyeurism.

🔵Secretly Recorded Girlfriend and Her Kids | Nichiren Ogando | Police Interrogation - https://youtu.be/60dtB9h8C8E

🔵Father of Victims | Nichiren Ogando Case | Police Interview - https://youtu.be/mWDYTeXiWHg

🔵Child Victim #1 | Nichiren Ogando Case | Police Interview - https://youtu.be/6oMj7m31Dm4

🔵Child Victim #2 | Nichiren Ogando Case | Police Interview - https://youtu.be/2XRpwxAeNDI

🔵Mother and Girlfriend of Nichiren Ogando Case | Police Interrogation - https://youtu.be/u1Et80mZoOY
